data.title: Arrival Time
data.statement:
You are taking a flight to another city.
The arrival city might be located in another country in another Time Zone.
You want to find when you will arrive in that city in the arrival city Time Zone.
data.stubGenerator:
read h:int
read m:int
read flightTime:int
read depTz:string(10)
read arrTz:string(10)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> [[h]] : integer, hour of departure
<<Line 2 :>> [[m]] : integer, minutes of departure
<<Line 3 :>> [[flightTime]] :  integer, flight time in minutes
<<Line 4 :>> [[depTZ]] : string, departure time zone in format "UTC+x" / "UTC-x"
<<Line 5 :>> [[arrTZ]] : string, arrival time zone in format "UTC+x" / "UTC-x"
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> The time you will arrive in that city in the arrival city time zone
In format : HH:MM
<<Line 2 :>> Only If you arrive the next day "TOMORROW" in letters

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are taking a flight to another city.
The arrival city might be located in another country in another Time Zone.
You want to find when you will arrive in that city in the arrival city Time Zone.
Input
Line 1 : h : integer, hour of departure
Line 2 : m : integer, minutes of departure
Line 3 : flightTime : integer, flight time in minutes
Line 4 : depTZ : string, departure time zone in format "UTC+x" / "UTC-x"
Line 5 : arrTZ : string, arrival time zone in format "UTC+x" / "UTC-x"
Output
Line 1 : The time you will arrive in that city in the arrival city time zone
In format : HH:MM
Line 2 : Only If you arrive the next day "TOMORROW" in letters
Constraints
0 ≤ h < 24
0 ≤ m < 60
Example
Input
10
0
30
UTC+1
UTC+1
Output
10:30
